testsmell

Class DetectionExample

  • java.lang.Object
    • testsmell.DetectionExample

  • public class DetectionExample
extends java.lang.Object
    DetectionExample for simplify test Smell Detection process.

    Use this class to detect Test smell instead of call each Test smell rule separately 1. prepareforDetection 2. getDetectionResult 3. getTestSmellResult() A monitor can be take in to show progress bar.

    Author:
    Haoran Lu
